sentences.english: Creative Adam and Eve inspired blanket cover for your bed.
sentences.chinese: 受亚当和夏娃所启发的创意毛毯床罩。

sentences.english: A cream lace throw covered the bed.
sentences.chinese: 奶油色的蕾丝床罩盖在床上。

sentences.english: The bedcover was quilted in a flower design.
And if the mattress itself isn't frightening enough, there's the whole subject of mattress covers.
sentences.chinese: 床垫本身并没有多大危害，那就要看床罩是否有问题。

sentences.english: Mom and I crocheted new quilts.
sentences.chinese: 我和妈妈钩织了新床罩。

sentences.english: My great aunt crocheted a beautiful bedspread for me.
sentences.chinese: 我亲爱的婶婶给我织了一个漂亮的床罩。

sentences.english: She spread her with embroided cover.
sentences.chinese: 她床上铺的是刺绣床罩。

sentences.english: She spread her with embroider cover.
sentences.chinese: 她床上铺的是刺绣床罩。

sentences.english: A large number of bedspreads we ordered from you last year were found soiled when they reached us.
sentences.chinese: 我们去年订购的大量的床罩到达我方时已经受损了。

sentences.english: Her gaze fell on the mud-stained coverlet.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光落在溅满泥浆的床罩上。

sentences.english: The television was sheathed in a snug coverlet.
sentences.chinese: 电视机用一个床罩严严实实地盖住了。

sentences.english: Fabric made of this cord, commonly used for bedspreads or rugs.
sentences.chinese: 一般用作床罩或地毯的绳绒线织成的织物。

sentences.english: The evening was just cool enough to make it worth while to pull up the counterpane .
sentences.chinese: 夜晚很凉爽，得把床罩揭起来盖上身子。

sentences.english: Finishing touches for the bed included a custom-made coverlet and matching decorative pillows.
sentences.chinese: 还有定制床罩和枕头匹配装饰等床上用品。
